text: that will transform the future of corporation where today the fundamental unit is a human employee but eventually the fundamental unit will primarily be AI agents. Of course there will be people who supervise these agents. this will become an incredible way to create value because when all these agents work together there's no friction, no politics, no miscommunication. We're embracing huge massive uncertainty in human history. But companies built from the ground up or transformed completely where the CEO is the driver of the transformation will be one that achieves the most in this generative AI revolution.
